title: (x) Surf Pools/Cumberland Valley - ITC Eras, Classic Roman {Chester, Patricia}
author: bessd1

comments.content: Yes, the Eras was correct with a little tweaking. I am still stumped on the “Cumberland” font.

Yeah, my Trajan-esque ID skills are weak. It looks vaguely Goudy-an, though, with that high waist. Other clues are from the foot serif on the U, and the crazy overshoot in the top-left serif of the M and N.

Cumberland is Classic Roman from the Engravers series.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/classic-roman/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060209020553/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/classic-roman/)
